title: Rocky road slices
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain flour', '80g ground walnuts', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon butter', '5 tablespoons packed brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '50g miniature marshmallows', '170g chocolate chips', '1 egg']
